tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had a very good experience with Dr. Shabana Babu.
She is very calm and understands our concerns very well.
She explains everything in detail 
Highly recommend Dr Shabana for PCOS/PCOS.

I am very grateful to Dr. Shabana for her care and expertise in guiding my journey to motherhood. After two years of trying to conceive, Doctor recommended ovulation induction which helped me conceive. 
Throughout my antenatal period, Dr. Shabana provided unwavering support and guidance. She was always present and helped put my mind at ease during those crucial months.
she also conducted a successful normal delivery, ensuring the safety of both me and my baby. Her dedication to her patients' well-being is evident in every aspect of her care.

Best fertility center with affordable price. We had a great experience in Hive. Dr.Shabana mam is very caring and supportive. All the supporting staff are very kind and following up with patients in a timely manner.

********** **** ** * **** ********* ********** *** **** ******.. she clearly explained all my doubts and queries...she is available at The hive fertility clinic tambaram. It's flexible timing especially for working people . I highly recommend Dr Shabana Babu for the people who looking for fertility treatment in the evening times..

Dr. Shabana is an amazing fertility doctor who helped us conceive our first child. She was very knowledgeable and experienced, and he recommended a treatment plan that was tailored to our needs. We highly recommend her to anyone struggling with infertility.

Dr. Shabana Babu is a compassionate and skilled fertility doctor I got recommendation to one of our family member through a close aid. She was always available to answer our questions and address our concerns, and she made us feel comfortable and supported throughout the process.

I am immensely grateful to Dr. Shabana for her exceptional care throughout my fertility treatment. Her expertise in the field along with her compassion, and dedication made my challenging journey feel manageable. She took the time to thoroughly explain each course of action in the treatment and cleared my doubts and concerns with patience. Thanks to Dr. Shabana and her team from the bottom of my heart.

Awesome doc, explains everything in detail.
Very friendly, humble *** ************* 
Thank you so much
Experienced doctor. Very good explanation. I wholehearted recommend Dr Shabana for anyone seeking a compassionate gynaecologist.
Met doctor after years of trying for a baby. She gave hope and with her guidance, we got pregnant after the first IUI. Thank you doctor and the team at Hive clinic,Tambaram.
